text: A kogda postiglo ikh Nashe nakazaniye, My Svoyey milost'yu spasli Salikha i tekh, kto uveroval s nim, ot istrebleniya, unizheniya i pozora, kotoryye postigli samudyan v den' ikh gibeli. Tvoy Gospod', o prorok, poistine, Vsesilen i Vsepobezhdayushch, poetomu bud' uveren v Yego sile, mogushchestve, podderzhke i pomoshchi
